title: Songs for a Hero: Definitive Edition – v5.0.5dx + All DLCs
body:
Songs for a Hero: Definitive Edition – v5.0.5dx + All DLCs


Genres/Tags: Adventure, Music, Platformer, Action, Side, 2D
Companies: Dumativa Game Studio, Castro Brothers
Languages: ENG/POR-BRA
Original Size: 2 GB
Repack Size: 1.1/1.4 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: ZippyShare
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]

  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Songs.for.a.Hero.Definitive.Edition-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-songs.for.a.hero.definitive.edition.iso (2,126,577,664 bytes)
  • Game version: v5.0.5dx; All DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of Portuguese-Brazil language pack
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 2 GB to 1.1/1.4 GB)
  • Installation takes 3-5 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 3.4 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

PS: Pretty funny game, but I’m not sure if constant hero’s singing won’t turn you into a serial killer in an hour 🙂

Game Description

Songs for a Hero: A Lenda do Herói Is an OLD-SCHOOL SUNG-THROUGH VIDEOGAME STRAVAGANZA! Join an unlikely hero as he sings his way through a strange world full of floating platforms, bright and colorful enemies, and many other inexplicable phenomena in an adventure unlike anything you have ever heard! This humorous old-school platformer features a fully dynamic soundtrack that reacts to your every input, meaning that the hero will always sing and crack jokes about whatever is happening to him, whenever it happens.

The Definitive Edition includes:

  • DLC – Songs for the Dead! A spooky chapter for “Songs for a Hero”. Fight your way through 3 levels with haunted mansions and crypts full of dark creatures that might as well have come straight from a horror movie. A brand-new campaign with plenty of heavy metal and rock’n’roll!
  • DLC – Songs for a Hero: Epilogue! A campaign that takes place right after the Hero’s last mission in Songs for a Hero.
  • DLC – Samba for a Hero! Nothing better than taking a vacation after tons of adventures, am I right? A new level inspired by the Brazilian Samba and Carnival!
  • Skin Pack I – Heroes – Customize your hero with new heads!
  • Skin Pack II – Hats Pack – Here is your chance to play like a Slime, Snake, Dogs or Cactus!
